messages.title: Labour's lost it
messages.content: Local people are fed up of being taken for granted by the Labour government.

messages.title: REAL CHANGE in Walthamstow
messages.content: Real change in Walthamstow can only come from electing Liberal Democrat Farid Ahmed. He has served our community for many years.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats, with Nick Clegg and Vince Cable, will deliver fairer taxes so millionaires pay more and you pay less.
Local MP will fight to protect Whipps Cross Hospital.

mentions.candidate: Farid Ahmed is known for getting things done and for his high reputation.

issues.economy: The leaflet criticizes the Labour government's tax hikes on ordinary people during the recession and the Conservative's same old millionaires' tax cuts.
issues.governance: Criticism of Labour government not delivering after 13 years and the scandal of MPs' abuse.

leaflet.personalStatement: We think it's high time Farid was given a chance to show what he can do as our local MP.

politicalExperience.achievements: Reputation for getting things done in the community.

images.caption: Nick Clegg and Vince Cable supporting fairer taxes.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes a 'ROLL OF SHAME' detailing the failures attributed to Labour, such as taking the country to an illegal war in Iraq, doubling violent crime, closing local post offices, neglecting local area, and doubling tax on the lowest paid.
